citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:50 p.m. -
2:30 p.m. on 08/04/2016. Phone calls were made to the numbers on file. Messages were left, but no one returned
the phone calls while the APHIS Official was present at the facility.
